package.name: ModernSettings
package.shortDescription: Widgets and Modules in System Preferences

descriptionlist.description:
Add various modules and widgets to system Preferences. -Module with photo -Battery widget -Storage widget -Communication and power module -Information module about your phone -You can change the name of some sections of the system Settings directly in the tweak
COMPATIBLE with: iOS 13 iOS 12 iPhone SE (2nd generation), 6, 6 Plus, 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XR, XS, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro and 11 Pro Max
NOT COMPATIBLE with: iPhone SE (1st generation) and all models before iPhone 6 iPad (PLANNED).
